name: DRIFT APOCALYPSE
description:
An arcade game where you drift to survive. How many zombies can you exterminate before the end of the world?

- DRIFT OVER ZOMBIES.

- COMPETE WITH YOUR FRIENDS TO ACHIEVE THE BEST SCORE.

- UNLOCK NEW UNIQUE VEHICLES.

Hold (LEFT / A) or (RIGHT / D) to turn.

Hold (LEFT / A) and (RIGHT / D) together to BOOST.

DRIFT over zombies to FINISH them.

Big ones will leave POISONING GAS.

Be careful with the FRONT of the car... Your engine is FRAGILE!

SCORE shows you how close you are from your BEST.

Keep DRIFTING to mantain the COMBO and get POWER-UPS.
